name: New Year Spinach Fettuccine with Scallops
author: WALKIE74
summary: I made this with my fiancee for a fancy New Year's Eve dinner. If you use sea scallops and not bay scallops, cut them into quarters before adding them to the pasta.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and reserve
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, heat 1 to 2 tablespoons of oil and add spinach and salt and pepper to taste
Saute spinach for 5 to 7 minutes or until wilted and no longer watery
Remove spinach from skillet and toss with pasta; transfer and keep warm
In the same skillet, heat 2 more tablespoons of oil and add scallops and 2 cloves of sliced garlic
Cook scallops for 1 to 2 minutes or until they appear opaque
Add scallops and garlic to fettuccine and spinach mix; transfer and keep warm
In the same skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil
Add 2 more cloves of sliced garlic and saute until golden
Add mushrooms, soup and white wine to skillet
Stir over medium heat for 8 minutes or until warm
Pour over fettuccine and spinach and add ground black pepper to taste; serve
